mapper.select: SELECT MENU_ID , MENU_TITLE , MENU_CD , PARENT_MENU_CD , MENU_LEVEL , MENU_ORDER , TO_CHAR(REGISTER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGISTER_DATE , TO_CHAR(MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MODIFY_DATE , VIEW_YN , MENU_TYPE , CONTENT FROM MENU WHERE VIEW_YN = 'Y' CONNECT BY PARENT_MENU_CD = MENU_CD ORDER BY MENU_ORDER, MENU_CD
